name: Digital Visiting/Business Card
author: RND Experts, Rajeev Kumar

sections.description:
With this plugin you only need to install and then put your basic information and your business card is ready to view, You can share that link with any one and they can view your business card, So we can also call it MiniPocket Website or Paper Less Business Card. This is plugin is good fit for small, medium and large organization. This plugin using the Custom Post Type.

Privacy Notes

This plugin does not track any additional data other than what WordPress natively collects upon registration. It just makes the data visble.

GDPR (General Data Protection Regulation)

The plugin is GDPR compliant. It does not use or store any kind of user information/data. In fact, it’s functionality has nothing to do with user data (personal or otherwise). So there’s that.

License

MIT

You should have received a copy of the MIT License along with this program.
If not, see http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT.

Donate

If you like this plugin and find it useful, consider making a [donation] (https://paypal.me/rndexperts) :).
sections.installation:
• Only you need to install the wordpress.
  • Either using FTP or Dashboard you can install the plugin.
sections.faq:
Can I download the plugin from WordPress Directory

Yes, You can download and install.

Does this plugin support mulitple business card?

Yes, You can create unlimited business card

Can I Use my company logo on the business card

Yes, You can use as a featured image.

What about if I need help?

You can create the ticket using the support and we will get back to you.

  3. Frontend view of digital bussiness card to end user.
sections.reviews:
Plugin Not Working with any theme

By hardwarezonein on July 7, 2022

Unable to publish card it shows 404 page not found

Good idea, but plugin doesn't work with Avada

By rstawisinski on May 11, 2022

Interesting idea for a plugin. Unfortunately, it doesn't work for me. Ultimately, I am looking for a module that allows you to prepare a business card, display a business card and download it as a vcard.
